title: Riots Ticketing system
body: I have an issue in game with disconnecting approx. every 2 minutes. I send a ticket to riot and not a single response for a whole day. I would imagine that they would be able to accomplish this task, knowing that they have the most popular PC game.

replies.body:
Ticket response times heavily depend on how many others players have requested help lately. Due to the recent events in-game, we've seen a influx of more tickets than normal. Sit tight and one of our tech specialists will get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I am just curious as to why i have the in-game issue of the disconnecting constantly.

Our tech specialists will be able to take a look at your system logs you've provided and answer that for you.  :)

Let me know if you have any other issues or concerns.
